artist: Draftsman: Sébastien Leroy; Etcher: Louis Yves Quéverdo; Engraver: François Pigeot; Painter: After Raphael (Raffaello Sanzio or Santi)
description: Virgin seated in clouds above holding Christ Child; below St. John the Baptist and St. Francis of Assisi at left and St. Jerome and Sigismondo de Conti at right; directly below Virgin is a putto holding a tablet
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscriptions

Above image in black: No. 607  RAPHAEL  Eco\'le le Ital\'ne | Below image in black: Dess S. le Roy  Gravé a l\"Eau-forte par Quéverdo  Termé par Pigeot / LA VIERGE AU DONATAIRE | on sheet in pencil: 2-253
title: The Madonna of Foligno
